first.name: Palmerston
first.content: Wow. I really can't believe you defeated Norna and Wyrd so easily! I'm impressed.

2.name: Feline
2.content: We never mentioned that we defeated them... Palmerston, do you know something that we don't?

4.name: Palmerston
4.content: I'm conceerned by numerous reports of our citizens being antagonised by monsters. Events like these are happening all around the GeoRing.

5.name: Palmerston
5.content: ...I have a feeling that these monster attacks are connected.@You said that Norna told you to stay away from the desert?

6.name: Palmerston
6.content: Maybe it's time to take a trip out to the deserts to meet an associate of mine named Dr. Letharia. She lives on the edge of the desert. An area called XAPS.

7.name: Palmerston
7.content: She'll know what to do. I'll add Letharia's location to your FeLine Mapz system, and let her know you're on your way for a visit.
